about_the_game:
A set of additional The Legend of Heroes: Hajimari no Kiseki character costumes.

Exclusive Elie Costume: Crossbell Queen
Exclusive Rixia Costume: Moonlight Wedding
Exclusive Nadia Costume: Sweet Devil Summer
Exclusive Lapis Costume: Magical Lapis
Exclusive Tio Costume: Tio's Original Suit

*Open [DLC] under [Item] page in the CAMP menu and select new items to receive them. The applicable characters must be friends in order to use costumes.
*After unlocking costumes, apply them via [Costume] in the CAMP menu.

*The products included in this pack can be purchased individually. Beware of duplicate purchases.
